divs: Sighting DetailsVERY LARGE DELTA OR TRIANGLE CRAFT THAT FLEW RIGHT OVER ME AT ABOUT 1000" I DID HEAR THE SOUND OF THE CRAFT INSIDE MY HOME WHILE I WAS TALKING ON THE PHONE!!!! WHEN I WENT OUTSIDE I SAW THE CRAFT MAKING A NORTH SOUTH FLIGHT PATTERN I DID CALL THE NEW MEXICO STATE POLICE TO REPORT THE SIGHTING AS THE CRAFT FLEW OVER ME... I DID ADVISE THEM THAT IT MUST OF BEEN A TOP SECRET U.S. AIR FORCE CRAFT OR VERY VERY LARGE ADVANCE BOMBER MUCH MUCH LARGER THAN A B-52 OR B-1 BUT WITH A SOLID DELTA WING BODY...
